PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-07612019-06-09,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectInterim Order Modifying the Operation of the Heavy-duty Vehicle and Engine Greenhouse Gas Emission Regulations
PrecisINTERIM ORDER MODIFYING THE OPERATION OF THE HEAVY-DUTY VEHICLE AND ENGINE GREENHOUSE GAS EMISSION REGULATIONS in order to (1) delay the greenhouse gas emission standards for trailers in Canada by one year after the Interim Order is made to allow time for the United States situation to become more certain; and (2) allow the Department of the Environment to assess the economic impacts of implementing trailer standards in Canada without the standards of the United States Environmental Protection Agency being in force.
AttachmentsAttachment
